Content: we went here for new years eve. while yes there was rubbish etc due to the high tides and it was crazy busy... there's heaps of amazing restaurants close by to sit back relax and watch the sunset.
review: go new year eve yes rubbish etc due high tide crazy busy there heap amaze restaurant close sit back relax watch sunset

Content: Beaches was filled with trash. Very disappointed. Beach had solicitors. No public bathrooms. Not worth going to don't waste your time and money.
review: beach fill trash disappointed solicitor public bathroom worth go dont waste time money

Content: As a beach, it's got dark coarse sand, and waves. What is really nice are the many places to sit a watch sunsets
review: get dark coarse sand wave really nice many place sit watch sunset

Content: In a hot and humid Bali, too find Seminyak beach was a life saver. Cool wind and warm seas greeted us and we stayed and drank beers and wine till the sun went down. This is not one of the most prettiest beaches we've seen but to provide some relief with that cool breeze was priceless.
review: hot humid bali find seminyak life saver cool wind warm sea greet u stay drank beer wine till sun go one prettiest beach weve see provide relief cool breeze priceless

Content: Super places on the beach, to party, to enjoy, to eat or drink. Super big waves, nice to watch and walk.
review: super place party enjoy eat drink super big wave nice watch walk

Content: The beaches are small and crowded but clean. good place to drink and eat alongside. Sometimes too many vendors spoil the fun but overall good experience
review: beach small crowd clean good place drink eat alongside sometimes many vendor spoil fun overall good experience

Content: sea can be a bit rough with large waves and a strong pull  good for surfing   the sea is really warm and clean . beach gets busy on night for the sun set but it is worth seeing.  plenty of bars and seating
review: sea bit rough large wave strong pull good surf sea really warm clean get busy night sun set worth see plenty bar seat

Content: Sad that such a long and stunning beach is so filthy. The sewerage that flows in to it from the is smelly and disgusting. Further along the beach, in front of Ku De Ta, the sewerage doesn't flow, but plastic cups and straws mix with the offerings on the sand. You have to dodge the plastic in the ocean. It's great to see the sunset, if you look past the rubbish.
review: sad long stun filthy sewerage flow smelly disgust along front ku de ta sewerage doesnt flow plastic cup straw mix offering sand dodge plastic ocean great see sunset look past rubbish

Content: Visited for a special birthday.Beach is fab, the waves are great fun. The traffic in Seminyak is unrelenting, whatever the time there is coming start flurry of scooters and cars through the narrow streets which makes journeys long.The people are friendly everywhere and all times felt very safe. Lots to see and do and as everywhere is resonably priced all the family can participate in lots of activities. If you want a relaxing holiday though this isn’t the area to stay!!!!
review: visit special birthdaybeach fab wave great fun traffic seminyak unrelenting whatever time come start flurry scooter car narrow street make journey longthe people friendly everywhere time felt safe lot see everywhere resonably price family participate lot activity want relax holiday though isnt area stay

Content: This is a nice beach for sundowners and surfers - not a swimming beach as a result of the surfers although you could have a quick dip at sunset when the surfers stop - nice sand and a great walk - lots to see and do - pictures and there are the beach vendors but they are very nice.............lots of clubs and restaurants along the beach W, Potatohead etc. La Laguna Restaurant and small independents - you will find something you love here............
review: nice sundowner surfer swim result surfer although quick dip sunset surfer stop nice sand great walk lot see picture vendor nicelots clubs restaurant along w potatohead etc la laguna restaurant small independent will find something love

Content: I enjoyed a nice walk along the beach , the waves were very strong now I know why most surf. Refreshing when its so hot.
review: enjoy nice walk along wave strong now know surf refreshing hot

Content: Sunset view is wonderful, and the wind breeze is very relaxing. There are just too much plastic here that some points are unwalkable.
review: sunset view wonderful wind breeze relax much plastic point unwalkable

Content: Very good place for evening ... Good and clean. Cleanliness can be increase.I would like to come again with my grandchildren.
review: good place even good clean cleanliness increasei come grandchild

Content: This beach is depressing - grey sand and brown water on the day we were there but the worst thing was the litter.  I have never seen such a filthy beach.  Would not dare to walk barefoot here!
review: depress grey sand brown water day bad thing litter never see filthy dare walk barefoot

Content: This beach is great for surfing and watching beautiful sunsets. We had a great time surfing and lounging on beach chairs. However, it is incredibly busy and isn't overly blue or beautiful.
review: great surf watch beautiful sunset great time surf lounge chair incredibly busy isnt overly blue beautiful

Content: We stayed at the Anantara hotel. It was fabulous - for service, pools, Buffet breakfast dinner experiences rooftop bar and restaurant. The staff could not have been more helpful or polite or just genuinely friendly and concerned for our enjoyment.
review: stay anantara hotel fabulous service pool buffet breakfast dinner experience rooftop bar restaurant staff helpful polite genuinely friendly concerned enjoyment

Content: I visited this beach yesterday and im happy to write that you must visit this beach. Beach is clean and has a splendid sunset view in the evening
review: visit yesterday im happy write must visit clean splendid sunset view even

Content: A really lovely beach, but be warned you get absolutely hassled by beach vendors trying to sell you anything and everything.
review: really lovely warn absolutely hassled vendor try sell anything everything

Content: The beach in Seminyak is okay. It's not the best but it's not bad. The waves are very strong so you have to be careful when staying there. The sunbeds sometimes get waves underneath them as the tide comes in very fast and far. However the location is very good as there are lots of restaurants and market stalls near.
review: seminyak okay best bad wave strong careful stay sunbeds sometimes wave underneath tide come fast far location good lot restaurant market stall near

Content: There are two halves to the beach, from the entrance to the right is a quiet long stretch of sand and to the left is a bustling vibrant beach bar and watersports stretch. Lovely place to walk early morning, fairly empty with just a few dog walkers, joggers, surfers  and yoga enthusiasts. During the day and evening it gets much livelier with the bars filling up, all competing at night to have the best / loudest live music! Food and drink can be found easily and cheaply and it's a good spot for a sociable evening / night. For surfing the waves tend to be suitable for beginners and there are a lot of surfing schools towards the far end of the beach where the moped track runs along the back. The track / road along the back of it dies get very busy with mopeds but that's Bali for you!
review: two half entrance right quiet long stretch sand leave bustle vibrant bar watersports stretch lovely place walk early morning fairly empty dog walker jogger surfer yoga enthusiast day even get much lively bar fill compete night best loud live music food drink find easily cheaply good spot sociable even night surf wave tend suitable beginner lot surf school towards far end moped track run along back track road along back dy busy moped thats bali

Content: The whole beachis a good visit if you are staying in that area. Nothing worth to be specially done from far off distances.It has few cafes on the beach which have Lazy Boys outside and you can sit and relay and enjoy few drinks while watching the sunset. They even have live bands playing in front of many Cafe's which are pretty decent for a lazy and relaxed evening.
review: whole beachis good visit stay area nothing worth specially do far distancesit cafe lazy boy outside sit relay enjoy drink watch sunset even live band play front many cafe pretty decent lazy relaxed evening

Content: Great place for a Bali sunset. There are some nice places for that along the stretch, but best spot is around the Italian restaurant la luciolla.
review: great place bali sunset nice place along stretch best spot around italian restaurant la luciolla

Content: Is THE place to be to watch an amazing sunset. Very busy towards the sunset, so best to get their early and lounge on one of the beach beds that you can rent from the locals. Lots of places to eat along the beach front, and plenty of places to learn to surf or hire surf equipment.
review: place watch amaze sunset busy towards sunset best early lounge one bed rent local lot place eat along front plenty place learn surf hire surf equipment

Content: Wandered down to the beach with 3 kids, aged 9 and our twin 7 year olds and were skipping over the Rubbish floating in from the beach and swatting away people trying to sell us just about everything. I wouldn’t go back.
review: wander 3 kid age 9 twin 7 year old skip rubbish float swat away people try sell u everything wouldnt go back

Content: A lot of scammers and money hungry people, stay on your game and if you don't want something say NO from the very start. Otherwise a beautiful beach.
review: lot scammer money hungry people stay game dont want something say start beautiful

Content: First time we went down to the beach, there was a lot of trash on the beach.  Maybe thrown up by some rough seas, but it was a little disconcerting to have to step over it.  Now it appears there has been some effort to clear it up, but some still remains.It didn't impact our stay at all, but worth noting.  Look past that, and it's still beautiful.
review: first time go lot trash maybe throw rough seas little disconcerting step now appear effort clear still remainsit didnt impact stay worth note look past still beautiful

Content: I like long walks on beaches and Seminyak Beach is a place for me.I like the feel of the wind in my face, the sand on my feet, and the sounds of the waves crashing in. Nice place for "me time or my time alone". Also nice to have friends to chat with.A definite place to visit more than once.The big plus factor is that the vendors are not aggressive and will not bother you once you say "no".  Go to this beach!
review: long walk beach seminyak place mei feel wind face sand foot sound wave crash nice place time time alone nice friend chat witha definite place visit oncethe big plus factor vendor aggressive will bother say go

Content: Lovely beach. Great waves. Watch the undercurrents though and take heed of what the lifeguards tell you. Sun lounger haggleto get 2 for 150k. Best Bakso in Bali is the guy with the street food cart just at the beach entrance.
review: lovely great wave watch undercurrent though take heed lifeguard tell sun lounger haggleto 2 150k best bakso bali guy street food cart entrance

Content: Beaches of Cuta and Seminyak are totally unswimmable due to the filth and debris in the water. Disgusting objects are everywhere and this area should be avoided. The beach vendors are a huge bother and the constant harrasment drives one up the wall - some even become aggressive if you ignore them! All in all, Bali was a complete dissapointment and the traffic is unbearble.
review: beach cuta seminyak totally unswimmable due filth debris water disgust object everywhere area avoid vendor huge bother constant harrasment drive one wall even become aggressive ignore bali complete dissapointment traffic unbearble

Content: The beaches are beautiful but sadly covered in rubbish. There are masses of cafes and its lovely sitting on the beach but the swimming is not recommended- poluted. We ended up travelling to Uluwatu to swim
review: beach beautiful sadly covered rubbish mass cafes lovely sit swim recommend poluted end travel uluwatu swim

Content: Water brown & very dirty. Sand is also brown & full of trash. Trash & debris everywhere. You walk & then need a bath/shower to clean up. No swimming-surf too rough.
review: water brown dirty sand brown full trash trash debris everywhere walk need bathshower clean swimmingsurf rough

Content: Less crowded compare with Kuta beach and For sure Don't miss watch the Sunset in Seminyak Beach if the weather are good it's So beautiful...
review: less crowd compare kuta sure dont miss watch sunset seminyak weather good beautiful

Content: Touristy, lots of people and nice little food stalls but it’s a shame that the stretch of beaches are all polluted with rubbish!
review: touristy lot people nice little food stall shame stretch beach pollute rubbish

Content: Hubbi and I knew we can't lounge for long at the beach...so we only wanted the beach chairs and umbrellas for a couple of hours and we were upfront about the short stay...still, we probably discussed with six different vendors and everyone of them was charging USD10 or more for the few hours we wanted to stay, crazy!!!We ended up sitting at one and got our price down to USD 8 per chair...for a bit over 2 hours we stayed :(Bali is so over-rated with tourists, it's often frustrating for travelers.
review: hubbi know cant lounge long beachso want chair umbrellas couple hour upfront short staystill probably discuss six different vendor everyone charge usd10 hour want stay crazywe end sit one get price usd 8 per chairfor bit 2 hour stay bali overrated tourist often frustrate traveler

Content: The beach is very nice, huge waves, nice breeze and very nice coffee restaurants near beach. all people are pleasant, and it is very peacefull.
review: nice huge wave nice breeze nice coffee restaurant near people pleasant peacefull

Content: Before we went to Bali i done research on the local beaches and a large percentage of the reviews were not great so we were not surprised when we arrived to see it full of rubbish and not really inviting, it's worth a visit to say you've seen it as it's only a 15 minute walk from the centre of Seminyak or 5 minutes in a taxi 30,000 one way...What I would recommend is to hire a cab to take you to some beaches as there's no local transport if you want to spend a day hanging out at the beach...
review: go bali do research local beach large percentage review great surprised arrive see full rubbish really invite worth visit say youve see 15 minute walk centre seminyak 5 minute taxi 30000 one waywhat recommend hire cab take beach there local transport want spend day hang

Content: large, spread out beaches makes it great for sunbathing (if not interrupted by the locals)..it is a glistening beach with darkish sand and not so crystal clear water. The waves roll and roll and it is pretty dangerous for new swimmers. Everything is ridiculously over priced and can be bargained down to 90%.There are lots of families with young kids and cute dogs running around on leashes which makes it a nice, friendly beach.
review: large spread beach make great sunbathe interrupted localsit glisten darkish sand crystal clear water wave roll roll pretty dangerous new swimmer everything ridiculously price bargain 90there lot family young kid cute dog run around leash make nice friendly

Content: Such a lovely beach to relax and watch the sun go down. This beach is no where near as busy as Kuta and the vibe is more relaxed and laid back. Different bats have chairs and bean bags set up on the sand with umbrellas and small tables so you don't need to move. The sellers will come up to you with various wares (from sunglasses to fairy floss) but they're not as aggressive as in some other parts as you are sitting in the designated area of a restaurant. The only drawback is that the bathrooms are not pleasant to use - the public ones cost money and are not clean and many of the restaurant ones are not clean either - bring some tissues and hand sanitiser just in case. Lovely, relaxed evening watching the sun go down!
review: lovely relax watch sun go near busy kuta vibe relax lay back different bat chair bean bag set sand umbrella small table dont need move seller will come various ware sunglasses fairy floss theyre aggressive part sit designated area restaurant drawback bathroom pleasant use public one cost money clean many restaurant one clean either bring tissue hand sanitiser case lovely relax even watch sun go

Content: We went to this beach around evening time. The beach looked deserted and not particularly clean. We spent 10-15 mins here and returned. The journey back was fun as the entire stretch has eateries and massage parlors
review: go around even time look deserted particularly clean spent 1015 min return journey back fun entire stretch eatery massage parlor

Content: We still love a beer on the beach, we always sit at Aussies bar it's just fun.  We do our souvenir shopping for the kids while we have a beer, massage and buy our fruit.You have to be prepared to be swarmed by the hawkers and be able to get rid of those you don't want to buy from- my method is be really nice and have fun with them but be up front and let them know right away that you're not interested and if you tell them you are then you should buy it from them and not waste their time arguing over 50 cents.  We get the cheapest prices on the beach and the fruit is always fresh and fabulous. It's important to remember this is whats done on the beaches in Bali, you can't be rude to these guys this is just what they do.Its a fun place to meet other travelers and have a chat, share experiences and make plans.Always worth a sit down for a icey cold drink . :-)
review: still love beer always sit aussie bar fun souvenir shopping kid beer massage buy fruityou prepare swarm hawker able rid dont want buy method really nice fun front let know right away youre interested tell buy waste time argue 50 cent cheap price fruit always fresh fabulous important remember whats do beach bali cant rude guy doits fun place meet traveler chat share experience make plansalways worth sit icey cold drink

Content: Great place to sit back in a bean chair, take in the sunset and enjoy a cold beverage at the end of the day
review: great place sit back bean chair take sunset enjoy cold beverage end day

Content: A great way to finish the day by watching the sunset with a drink on a beanbag. Lots of bars to choose from
review: great way finish day watch sunset drink beanbag lot bar choose

Content: What a lovely place to relax at sunset with a Bintang beer, do not however buy from the beach sellers as I did and was hounded by all the rest of them there after. Lol
review: lovely place relax sunset bintang beer buy seller hound rest lol

Content: its a long beach and clean,and the sand is good to walk on but not so fine,get a cheap foot massage done,one can get beach beds on hire at reasonable rate or simply hang out at kudeta lounge
review: long cleanand sand good walk fineget cheap foot massage doneone bed hire reasonable rate simply hang kudeta lounge

Content: It is a beautiful place and much cleaner than anything in Kuta. Not as many hagglers as well. Highly recommend!
review: beautiful place much clean anything kuta many haggler well highly recommend

Content: Our son did some surfing here with one of the locals. He is quite competent but needed someone to help with the local conditions. Would suit a beginner though. Importantly, there's a flagged and patrolled area outside the Oberoi Hotel for swimming where the undertow is a little less than elsewhere. There is some litter on the beach (but they clean outside the larger hotels incl the Oberoi) so those spots are cleaner and remember the sand is dark - but don't be put off. It's also great for a morning or afternoon walk. Hawkers are few and far between and the few that are there are not pushy.
review: son surf one local quite competent need someone help local condition suit beginner though importantly theres flag patrolled area outside oberoi hotel swim undertow little less elsewhere litter clean outside large hotel incl oberoi spot cleaner remember sand dark dont put great morning afternoon walk hawker far pushy

Content: Semyniak beach is one of the most wonderful place for surfers and young people as well, nevertheless you could find some parts where Bali is still have the  old style feeling with part of the jungle mixed with alang alang roofs.Specially the part in front of Oberoi Hotel where the nature is really protagonist and elegant garden landscape make you happy to walk on the beach...amazing!
review: semyniak one wonderful place surfer young people well nevertheless find part bali still old style feel part jungle mixed alang alang roofsspecially part front oberoi hotel nature really protagonist elegant garden landscape make happy walk beachamazing

Content: Atmosphere - music - just perfect - however cleaner toilets are needed - not to good on that situation
review: atmosphere music perfect clean toilet need good situation

Content: Used Seminyak Beach several times during our stay.. beach loungers and umbrellas can be rented as well as water toys boogie boards surf boards etc... nice place to swim and play
review: use seminyak several time stay lounger umbrella rent well water toy boogie board surf board etc nice place swim play

Content: Specially between October and March this beach is very dirty, full of locals selling things and eating. It’s not a good beach to catch sun
review: specially october march dirty full local sell thing eat good catch sun

Content: The beach at Seminyak is over crowded and dirty, lots of rubbish washing up. The redeeming fact is if you're staying on the beach it's great to watch the sun go down
review: seminyak crowd dirty lot rubbish wash redeem fact youre stay great watch sun go

Content: Seminyak beach is quite long.  It can get quite rough and it's not the most beautiful beach in Bali however it has some fantastic hotels and eateries and it's a great walk!  If you need a driver in Bali to take you there,  I can recommend Putu at fair dinkum transport and tours.  He's on tripadvisor too and took us all around seminyak
review: seminyak quite long quite rough beautiful bali fantastic hotel eateries great walk need driver bali take recommend putu fair dinkum transport tour hes tripadvisor take u around seminyak

Content: We went to the beach outside potato head beach club. My 3-year old son loved it and we stayed for an hour and a half! It was extremely hot, but we rented the beds under the umbrella for 100,000 IDR an hour and enjoyed a coconut drink. The sound of the waves were lovely and my son enjoyed playing sand under the umbrella.
review: go outside potato head club 3year old son love stayed hour half extremely hot rent bed umbrella 100000 idr hour enjoy coconut drink sound wave lovely son enjoy play sand umbrella

Content: Beautiful sunsets to be seen while relaxing on bean bags at any of the bars along the beach.  Highly recommend.
review: beautiful sunset see relax bean bag bar along highly recommend

Content: Uncluttered and clean. You might have to check into a good property for the towels and sun roof. Was a lovely experience.
review: uncluttered clean might check good property towel sun roof lovely experience

Content: Nice beach n beautiful view. Not many people and good for relax. Closed from my hotel just walk around 5 minutes. Love to came back  here next time with my family.
review: nice n beautiful view many people good relax close hotel walk around 5 minute love come back next time family

Content: We entered the beach at KuDeTa. It looked like this point was where beach rubbish was collected. It was great to see a rubbish removal system in place and dedicated workers collecting and removing rubbish and I am very aware that the rubbish they were collecting was doe to tourism and possibly bad weather so I am certainly not apportioning any blame however I would not go swimming as the water was visibly dirty and the sand was dirty as well. I am sorry Bali that our love of the island is the very thing causing the island to lose its feel of Paradise.
review: enter kudeta look point rubbish collect great see rubbish removal system place dedicated worker collect remove rubbish aware rubbish collecting doe tourism possibly bad weather certainly apportion blame go swimming water visibly dirty sand dirty well sorry bali love island thing cause island lose feel paradise

Content: Long long sandy beach - plenty of places to eat and drink Sun bed prices are very negotiable so haggle hard
review: long long sandy plenty place eat drink sun bed price negotiable haggle hard

Content: I had visited this beach in the noon, since it was a low season, enjoyed my time here. Clean and white sand beach, excellent choice for surfers. Do visit the beachfront cafes and restaurants for a sunset and great food and drinks.
review: visit noon low season enjoy time clean white sand excellent choice surfer visit beachfront cafe restaurant sunset great food drink

Content: We have spent a few days at the beach near Seminyak. The beach is clean, offers small waves for surfing and was monitored by lifeguards.
review: spent day near seminyak clean offer small wave surf monitor lifeguard

Content: Nice long beautiful beach!I highly recommend to go to La plancha beach bar for the sunset!Sunsets are just incredible on bali!
review: nice long beautiful beachi highly recommend go la plancha bar sunsetsunsets incredible bali

Content: It’s a busy fun beach, but well looked after. Don’t go if you are looking for peace and quiet! Surf looks great, and plenty of places to hire boards, eat, drink etc. It’s colourful! Loads of sun beds to chill out on  for the day..... gets really busy around sunset, sit back on a coloured bean bag, and absorb the spectacular sun set. Great atmosphere... with beer in hand...and lively way to watch the sun go down. Definite ‘do once’ when you are on Bali!
review: busy fun well look dont go look peace quiet surf look great plenty place hire board eat drink etc colourful load sun bed chill day get really busy around sunset sit back colour bean bag absorb spectacular sun set great atmosphere beer handand lively way watch sun go definite bali

Content: Very clean beach , not very crowded i think thats what makes it different ...had an amazing time there .
review: clean crowd think thats make different amazing time

Content: This beach is good to visit during early mornings. The tides just prepare to rise and the beach is filled up with joggers. You can go for an early morning surfing classes here. The beach starts getting crowded from 09:00 am onwards. The coastline is smaller, though, and I presume it has lot of rip tides and the flags line up at several points on the beach. Be advised when you are a surfing beginner.
review: good visit early morning tide prepare rise fill jogger go early morning surfing class start get crowded 0900 onwards coastline small though presume lot rip tide flag line several point advise surf beginner

Content: We went to Seminyak beach a few times during our stay in Seminyak. It is a nice beach for sunsets. When it gets dark the atmosphere on the beach is great. Only downside is the waves are extremely strong.
review: go seminyak time stay seminyak nice sunset get dark atmosphere great downside wave extremely strong

Content: We do Surf Lesson for beginners, Surfing Instructor will explan for instruction and help the beginner surfer to catch the wave and padle to stand up on the surf board and we will take photos of beginner surfer when they stand up and ride them waves on the surfboard.. Duration 1 hour and 2 hours.
review: surf lesson beginner surf instructor will explan instruction help beginner surfer catch wave padle stand surf board will take photo beginner surfer stand ride wave surfboard duration 1 hour 2 hour

Content: I enjoy spending the day here, if you are in Bali I recommend this beach. I spent my day walking around, having Balinese lunch and watching people. I will visit this place again in the near future
review: enjoy spending day bali recommend spent day walk around balinese lunch watch people will visit place near future

Content: I am just reviewing Seminyak Beach ( Marriott hotel beach). Its been a long time since we used to holiday in Bali. but over 10 years ago, Bali beaches were polluted (full of rubbish), fortunately, this have changed now, beaches are clean. This in itself, will play a big deal for our next holiday destination.
review: review seminyak marriott hotel long time use holiday bali 10 year ago bali beach pollute full rubbish fortunately change now beach clean will play big deal next holiday destination

Content: Yes nice beach, clean not garbage everywhere, easy to chill. Love to see sunset here and the wave cool, you can play either.
review: yes nice clean garbage everywhere easy chill love see sunset wave cool play either

Content: Perfect place to enjoy the sun, sand and the weather. We went in the evening, it was a 10 minute walk from our hotel- had a nice long stroll by the beach. It’s very clean and well kept  Sunset at the beach is a must watch for all visitors of Bali ... shacks here are nice ! U can try la plancha food and music !!
review: perfect place enjoy sun sand weather go even 10 minute walk hotel nice long stroll clean well kept sunset must watch visitor bali shack nice u try la plancha food music

Content: We were walking up and down the beach several times with great joy during our 2 week vacation. With high tide and low tide.  Great spot for sunsets, but not ideal for swimming, strong current. great for surfing, has plenty of bars and coffee shops for resting along the beach and lovely in the evening too.  Prices for beach chair ridiculous...  Beach was reasonably clean.
review: walk several time great joy 2 week vacation high tide low tide great spot sunset ideal swim strong current great surf plenty bar coffee shop rest along lovely even price chair ridiculous reasonably clean

Content: A nice beach for a walk or to watch the sunset. Plenty of sun beds to rent and beach clubs to visit.
review: nice walk watch sunset plenty sun bed rent club visit

Content: Seminyak is an extension of Legian and Kuta but not as busy. Had nice waves the day I was there. The beauty is having a drink watching the sun set. Could do this every night.
review: seminyak extension legian kuta busy nice wave day beauty drink watch sun set every night

Content: Busy and alive place nighttime to watch the sunset with a cocktail in the hand ... lot of restaurant and bar !
review: busy alive place nighttime watch sunset cocktail hand lot restaurant bar

Content: We finally found it was a bit of a trek it was overcast the day we went and didn’t even get on the beach before a lady spotted us and tried to sell some sarongs..
review: finally find bit trek overcast day go didnt even lady spot u try sell sarong

Content: After strolling down the beach one early afternoon we settled in to the bean bags out side of a Bar/ restaurant,"sorry cant remember the name" had the most fantastic vibe and of course plenty cold beers... Sunset was amazing highly recommended way to spend an afternoon at leasure
review: stroll one early afternoon settle bean bag side bar restaurantsorry cant remember name fantastic vibe course plenty cold beer sunset amaze highly recommended way spend afternoon leasure

Content: fantastic beach with superb lifeguards due to its location.wonderful sunsets and plenty of umbrellas & loungers if you're staying at one of the hotels along its length.
review: fantastic superb lifeguard due locationwonderful sunset plenty umbrellas lounger youre stay one hotel along length

Content: Not the best beach i have ever seen, but cozy, hot and dark sand.Don't wait Seychelle-like place but enjoy the different type:)
review: best see cozy hot dark sanddont wait seychellelike place enjoy different type

Content: Must be one of the most beatyful beaches i have seen (no sharks) big waves, perfekt for surfing. Only minus is the sales people constantly saying "want to buy".
review: must one beatyful beach see shark big wave perfekt surf minus sale people constantly say want buy

Content: Seminyak has a lovely beach, a lot nicer than the beach in Kuta in my opinion. Sunbeds are cheaper here too. Loads of cool bars along the beach front too :)
review: seminyak lovely lot nice kuta opinion sunbeds cheaper load cool bar along front

Content: Seminyak Beach is a lot quieter than Kuta or even Legian..... beautiful place for a stroll first thing in the morning or late of an afternoon to watch the sunset.
review: seminyak lot quieter kuta even legian beautiful place stroll first thing morning late afternoon watch sunset

Content: We stayed in Seminyak for 2 weeks during Christmas and New Year. We’ve been coming to Bali for 24 years but always staying in Bali Hyatt in Sanur then to Grand Hyatt in Nusa Dua. This time though, we decided to rent a villa in Seminyak, 5 minutes walk from Ku De Ta.On our first day, I ran on the beach. It was DISGUSTING! I saw dogs pooing on the beach, pile  of rubbish so high I thought from afar that  they are piling it for new year’s bonfire until I got close to it and it was a pile of rubbish. I ran for 5 km and it was just horrifying.  I’ve never seen this part of Bali and I feel so sad that such beach condition exists.Also the pack of dogs that are present along the beach can be very intimidating and very aggressive. Parents especially with small children, Beware!
review: stay seminyak 2 week christmas new year weve come bali 24 year always stay bali hyatt sanur grand hyatt nusa dua time though decided rent villa seminyak 5 minute walk ku de taon first day run disgust saw dog pooing pile rubbish high thought afar pile new year bonfire get close pile rubbish run 5 km horrify ive never see part bali feel sad condition existsalso pack dog present along intimidate aggressive parent especially small child beware

Content: When in Bali, me with friends always come to Petitenget Beach to enjoy the beach while waiting for sunset.Different with Kuta where on the bach so many locals sunbed, and in Double Six where so many beach bar.In Petitenget's Seminyak beach you can take your own beach towel and have your own time. Of course, there's still locals try to sell products or food, but it's because Petitenget is public beach but sometime is clearer than the two (Kuta & Double Six)
review: bali friend always come petitenget enjoy wait sunsetdifferent kuta bach many local sunbed double six many barin petitengets seminyak take towel time course there still locals try sell product food petitenget public sometime clear two kuta double six

Content: Our hotel was opposite the beach so literally left the complex onto the beach which is a lovely beach both day and night. Many bars have live bands in the evening so great to sit and relax of an evening after spending a day doing nothing
review: hotel opposite literally leave complex onto lovely day night many bar live band even great sit relax even spending day nothing

Content: Nice beach with good waves and LOTS of people as it is here.You can find nice food anywhere. Remember sunscreen when u walk around
review: nice good wave lot people hereyou find nice food anywhere remember sunscreen u walk around

Content: Lovely beach, but just like any other sandy beach! It goes on for miles though! Wonderful walk along the beach where you pass many bars to stop off and have a drink and sun loungers to chill on and catch a tan!
review: lovely sandy go mile though wonderful walk along pass many bar stop drink sun lounger chill catch tan

Content: Came here twice on 2 occasion, You can find bars, restaurants near by. Suntan on the beach, learn surfing, play in the sea, take a walk. At night, usually many bars/restaurants will bring out bean bags on the beach and have live music and its a sight to hear and see.For surfing, its a very good place for beginners. Price per person for 1h lesson and 1h free surfing $100,000 - $150,000
review: come twice 2 occasion find bar restaurant near suntan learn surf play sea take walk night usually many barsrestaurants will bring bean bag live music sight hear seefor surf good place beginner price per person 1h lesson 1h free surf 100000 150000

Content: Seminyak beach is actually Kuta beach all the way north to Canggu and sees beach. This is just one long beach facing west and is the offshore wind side of the island during the dry season from April to October. Fantastically long beach with great low tide beach walks.
review: seminyak actually kuta way north canggu see one long face west offshore wind side island dry season april october fantastically long great low tide walk

Content: Not the cleanest beach we have seen and be careful not to be run over by the learn to surf groups. Nevertheless the water is cooler than the outside temp and the sunbeds for hire are very comfortable but we did swim one at a time in the surf for fear of losing gear..
review: cleanest see careful run learn surf group nevertheless water cooler outside temp sunbeds hire comfortable swim one time surf fear lose gear

Content: We stayed in Seminyak for a week and absolutely loved the beach!  We walked the beach every morning before visiting another area.  We also spent a couple of days lounging on the beach with coconut water or a mixed drink.  Beautiful beach, beautiful view.  It was a little dirty and didn't have any garbage cans.
review: stay seminyak week absolutely love walked every morning visit another area spend couple day lounge coconut water mixed drink beautiful beautiful view little dirty didnt garbage can

Content: There's heaps of great beach bars along this strip.Lots to look at but way to many blokes handing out those stupid cards. grrrr.
review: there heap great bar along striplots look way many bloke hand stupid card grrrr

Content: We went to the beach through Potato Head bar. I love blue sea, but Seminyak beach is a bit grey. A bit disappointed.
review: go potato head bar love blue sea seminyak bit grey bit disappointed

Content: We loved this beach ! However expect to be asked every 2 minutes literally to buy things ... if your girlfriend loves to sun bathe and you get a bit bored though this is a good way to keep busy so i really didn't mind we caught some rays and listened to some nice music ... on our own speaker that is , the beds were really comfy and we didn't get hasseled by the people's beds we used they were really nice :) we'll be back
review: love expect ask every 2 minute literally buy thing girlfriend love sun bathe bit bore though good way keep busy really didnt mind catch ray listen nice music speaker bed really comfy didnt hasseled people bed use really nice well back

Content: A very average beach - ok for the younger crowd I guess, but not what I would call an attractive beach.
review: average ok young crowd guess call attractive

Content: Just a beach. But still nice to visit. Make sure you swim between the flags or you will be caught in a strong rip
review: still nice visit make sure swim flag will catch strong rip

Content: Long white sandy beach  and hot. standing on the beach you can see right back to the airport.Not so many beach vendors trying to sell stuff to you all the time.
review: long white sandy hot stand see right back airportnot many vendor try sell stuff time

Content: Great beach to sit and soak up the rays and atmosphere or watch the kite flying and people watch. Close to the shopping centre and great eateries. Good walk along beach to Double Six Beach or even further to Kuta Beach.
review: great sit soak ray atmosphere watch kite fly people watch close shopping centre great eatery good walk along double six even kuta

Content: I found the beach unclean.  I’m use to white sands the whole nine yards.  I can’t compare it to the Caribbean of course. I do think there needs to be more effort to maintain it.  Definitely the most expensive beach I have been to just to hire a beach chair, more so than Jamaica negril believe it or not. Roughly £12 for less than 4 hours. Ludicrous.
review: find unclean im use white sand whole nine yard cant compare caribbean course think need effort maintain definitely expensive hire chair jamaica negril believe roughly 12 less 4 hour ludicrous

Content: Love all the Bars with choices of tables & chairs or bean bags on the sand. Bean bags are best. Live entertainment most nights.  Food good & not expensive, beer prices not much more than you pay at a mini-mart.  Great to spend a hot night there cooling off, enjoying the beautiful sunsets.
review: love bar choice table chair bean bag sand bean bag best live entertainment night food good expensive beer price much pay minimart great spend hot night cool enjoy beautiful sunset

Content: Great beach for long walks...surf schools...sunbathing. At night all the beach bars have bean bag chairs and umbrellas and candles and live music.  And of course food and drink...great place to relax and soak up the local vibe...
review: great long walkssurf schoolssunbathing night bar bean bag chair umbrellas candle live music course food drinkgreat place relax soak local vibe

Content: The time we visited the weather was pretty stormy and there were signs warning of rips!  Not a safe place to swim! However walk up to the Westin hotel and have a drink while watching the sunset!  Good people watching Place and nice and relaxing!
review: time visit weather pretty stormy sign warn rip safe place swim walk westin hotel drink watch sunset good people watch place nice relaxing

Content: Nice white sand beach surrounded with a lot of restaurant, great location nearby Bali's Airport, we will come back next year
review: nice white sand surround lot restaurant great location nearby balis airport will come back next year

Content: Family with 2.5yo toddler. It's ok for lounging around but not that good for children. Parts of beach close to fancy hotels are manicured otherwise rubbish in others.
review: family 25yo toddler ok lounge around good child part close fancy hotel manicure rubbish others

Content: This beach is fabulous with very colourful beach bars.Always wear flip flops though as the sand gets ridiculously hot!The tip i would give is stick to where the Air Asia umbrellas and loungers are. All the beach bars there have toilets.Passed that it is cooler and hipper but the beach bars don’t have toilets and the public ones are closed!Lovely chilled atmosphere with beanbag at the bars, which has no charge unlike the loungers. Just have to drink and/or eat.
review: fabulous colourful barsalways wear flip flop though sand get ridiculously hotthe tip give stick air asia umbrellas lounger bar toiletspassed cool hipper bar dont toilet public one closedlovely chill atmosphere beanbag bar charge unlike lounger drink andor eat

Content: Ummmm.... it's a beach. What can I say. When we were there, there we night markets, shows and so on but we just got scammed that day so in a less then happy mood. Still, having said that, the wife did like the night life and it made her smile so you take what you want out of that
review: ummmm say night market show get scammed day less happy mood still say wife night life make smile take want

Content: Our villa is ten minutes walks from this beach so we went there three times with kids. Compared with other very commercialised beach (Jimbaran), this beach is still having a feeling of openness, wildness and quietness. The sunset there are beautiful!
review: villa ten minute walk go three time kid compare commercialise jimbaran still feel openness wildness quietness sunset beautiful

Content: Nice beach to sit down and watch the sun set! There aren't too many vendors hassling you and it's great to sit near the beach clubs to hear the music and chill out.Great beach to relax and pop into the beach clubs for a drink.
review: nice sit watch sun set arent many vendor hassle great sit near club hear music chill outgreat relax pop club drink

Content: Nice sandy beach, quiet and good for relaxing , but sometimes dirty The atmosphere is very pleasant.If I have time again I will surely go back there
review: nice sandy quiet good relaxing sometimes dirty atmosphere pleasantif time will surely go back

Content: Lets be clear, it's not Australia or the med, it's Bali so it can be a little dirty. Despite that, it's a nice place
review: let clear australia med bali little dirty despite nice place

Content: The beach was a quick walk from our villa, we arrived around 4.30 and grabbed a seat to watch the sunset and have an early dinner. Plenty of places to eat and so so cheap. You will get bugged by people selling kites and watches.
review: quick walk villa arrive around 430 grabbed seat watch sunset early dinner plenty place eat cheap will bug people sell kite watch

Content: walked out onto the beach and was shocked by the level of rubbish on it.  One woman trying to sweep it all into piles.  Not somewhere I would like to spend my holiday.
review: walk onto shocked level rubbish one woman try sweep pile somewhere spend holiday

Content: All brown and yukky..didn't even go swimming...there were ppl annoying you to buy things everywhere and no signs or anything to show you where to exit the beach. Not good for kids at all.
review: brown yukkydidnt even go swimmingthere ppl annoy buy thing everywhere sign anything show exit good kid

Content: Back when I was at primary school I remember seeing a to programme ('Watch') that featured Bali and it looked like paradise. Long time ago that but I'm now here at Seminyak Beach. Perhaps not the place it was back then and although nice enough I have visited many many more attractive beaches.Sand is lovely and fine but volcanic so quite dark in colour. It's a huge expanse of sand with little natural shade but there are rows an rows of sun beds with umbrellas like in Italy which I don't like. Hence for me it's paradise lost
review: back primary school remember see programme watch feature bali look paradise long time ago im now seminyak perhaps place back although nice enough visit many many attractive beachessand lovely fine volcanic quite dark colour huge expanse sand little natural shade row row sun bed umbrellas italy dont paradise lose

Content: No words can describe the beauty of this beach.   It's simply stunning and the water is so clean.  The sand is also great, making it a wonderful relaxation spot.  Definitely a must go place in bali.
review: word describe beauty simply stunning water clean sand great make wonderful relaxation spot definitely must go place bali

Content: Visited the beach close to the Courtyard and it was a BIG disappointment. It was so bad that I couldn't get myself to even take a photograph for uploading. The sands were full of garbage (plastic bottles, soda cans & wrappers). Didn't stay there even for  5 minutes after the 10 minute walk (one way).
review: visit close courtyard big disappointment bad couldnt even take photograph uploading sand full garbage plastic bottle soda can wrapper didnt stay even 5 minute 10 minute walk one way

Content: Our third  (and last) week at Seminyak Beach.Concluding: the beach is wonderful; but the (beach)restaurants here serve abstemious/average food; and certainly not cheap!But: you're on the beach: the sound of the waves, and so on.....that compensates a lot, you expect (and hope).But no: each beachrestaurant has its own stage with a very loud band playing. And of course you can discuss about music taste; but you cannot discuss about the volume of the music: you can hardly talk when they are playing   Every restaurant feels the urge to leave (like a dog) a smellflag.Our conclusion: spend your day at Seminyak Beach and for dinner: find a restaurant near Seminyak Square: several restaurants serve very good food (find them at TripAdvisor!!!). The price is often more than right and the music never dominates the atmosphere
review: third last week seminyak beachconcluding wonderful beachrestaurants serve abstemiousaverage food certainly cheapbut youre sound wave onthat compensate lot expect hopebut beachrestaurant stage loud band play course discus music taste discus volume music hardly talk play every restaurant feel urge leave dog smellflagour conclusion spend day seminyak dinner find restaurant near seminyak square several restaurant serve good food find tripadvisor price often right music never dominate atmosphere
